Package com.ibm.jikes.skij.misc

This package contains miscellaneous classes used in conjunction with Skij, but are not part of the main interpreter.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Adaptor This utility class is intended to allow users to package up Skij structure in the guise of a Java object that has its own methods.
DBPanel An extension to Panel that implements double-buffered drawing.
GenericCallback This class lets you handle AWT events with Scheme procedures.
GenericSwingCallback Extends GenericCallback to handle Swing events.
GraphPanel A class to support the graphical browser.
Hashpatch Some functions can't be implemented in Scheme due to security problems.
Kludge Sometimes reflection can't get through various internal classes; this class provides workarounds.
ListenerTextArea This class exists so that listeners can work in browsers that don't support 1.1 events.
Panel An extension to java.awt.Panel that paints itself using a Scheme procedure.
SkijAppletContext Support class for running applets under Skij.
SkijAppletStub Support for starting applets from within skij.
SkijSecurityManager Create a security manager whose policy is determined by a Scheme procedure.
 

Package com.ibm.jikes.skij.misc Description

This package contains miscellaneous classes used in conjunction with Skij, but are not part of the main interpreter. It includes support for a variety of functions, such as AWT callbacks, the graphing inspector, and the applet runner. Note: some of these classes lack polish.
